configurations.name: index
runtimeArgs: const h=require('http'),fs=require('fs'),p=require('path');h.createServer((q,s)=>{let f=p.join('/Users/jaydenkang/Desktop/New Projects/20260223_클로드 설명',q.url==='/'?'index.html':q.url);fs.readFile(f,(e,d)=>{if(e){s.writeHead(404);s.end('Not found')}else{const ext=p.extname(f);const t={'html':'text/html','css':'text/css','js':'application/javascript'}[ext.slice(1)]||'text/plain';s.writeHead(200,{'Content-Type':t});s.end(d)}})}).listen(3000,()=>console.log('Server running on port 3000'))
